data: “Did the ladies arrive, Mr. Stillwater?” inquired the clerk at the Waldorf Hotel, New York, as a tall, broad-shouldered man, unmistakably Western in appearance, walked smilingly up to the desk.
"Did the ladies arrive, Mr. Stillwater?" inquired the clerk at the Waldorf Hotel, New York, as a tall, broad-shouldered man, unmistakably Western in appearance, walked smilingly up to the desk.
Morton, Martha, 1865-1925; Morton, Victoria [Adapter]; Christy, Howard Chandler, 1873-1952 [Illustrator]; MacNamara, Esther [Illustrator]
